channel.title: CVE Feed for Hanwha Vision Co., Ltd. -- PNV-A6081R
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hanwha Vision Co., Ltd. -- PNV-A6081R

item.title: CVE-2023-5747|2024-08-02T08:07:32.650Z -- hanwha%20vision%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- pnv-a6081r
item.description: Bashis, a Security Researcher at IPVM has found a flaw that allows for a remote code execution during the installation of Wave on the camera device. The Wave server application in camera device was vulnerable to command injection allowing an attacker to run arbitrary code. HanwhaVision has released patched firmware for the highlighted flaw. Please refer to the hanwhavision security report for more information and solution."
